title: Shifting Focus From Cannabis to Other Cannabinoids With Ronan Levy, Trait Biosciences
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Ronan Levy is Chief Strategy Officer at Trait Biosciences, a cannabis biotech firm. Prior to joining Trait, Ronan served as Senior Vice President of Business and Corporate Affairs at Aurora Cannabis. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss the extreme growth the sector has seen and why big companies should be focused on market share over profitability. They also cover the commoditization of cannabis production, focusing on minor cannabinoids and why increasing yields and lowering costs are low hanging fruits. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
